chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
Z: Type
Y: Type
X: Type
TX: reduction_t A X
TY: reduction_t A Y
TZ: reduction_t A Z
R: relation2 X Y
S: relation2 Y Z

Goal:
wexpansion1 TY TZ S -> forall (x x' : Y) (y : Z), star (TY (T A)) x x' -> S x y -> exists2 y' : Z, star (TZ (T A)) y y' & S x' y'

Premises:
wexpansion1 : forall X Y : Type, reduction_t A X -> reduction_t A Y -> relation2 X Y -> Prop
relation2 = fun X Y : Type => X -> Y -> Prop : Type -> Type -> Type Arguments relation2 (_ _)%type_scope
T : forall A : Type, Lbl A
reduction_t = fun A : Type => reduction (Lbl A) : Type -> Type -> Type Arguments reduction_t (_ _)%type_scope
star : forall X : Type, relation X -> relation X
BinIntDef.Z.add = fun x y : BinNums.Z => match x with | BinNums.Z0 => y | BinNums.Zpos x' => match y with | BinNums.Z0 => x | BinNums.Zpos y' => BinNums.Zpos (BinPos.Pos.add x' y') | BinNums.Zneg y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub x' y' end | BinNums.Zneg x' => match y with | BinNums.Z0 => x | BinNums.Zpos y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub y' x' | BinNums.Zneg y' => BinNums.Zneg (BinPos.Pos.add x' y') end end : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.add (_ _)%Z_scope
Weak_ind : forall (A X : Type) (Red : reduction_t A X) (P : Lbl A -> X -> X -> Prop), (forall x : X, P (T A) x x) -> (forall (y : X) (l : Lbl A) (x z : X), Red (T A) x y -> Weak Red l y z -> P l y z -> P l x z) -> (forall (y : X) (a : A) (x z : X), Red (L a) x y -> Weak Red (T A) y z -> P (T A) y z -> P (L a) x z) -> forall (l : Lbl A) (x x' : X), Weak Red l x x' -> P l x x'
weak_strong_t : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (R : relation2 X Y), simulation_t TX TY R -> diagram (Weak TX (T A)) R (Weak TY (T A)) R
BinIntDef.Z.mul = fun x y : BinNums.Z => match x with | BinNums.Z0 => BinNums.Z0 | BinNums.Zpos x' => match y with | BinNums.Z0 => BinNums.Z0 | BinNums.Zpos y' => BinNums.Zpos (BinPos.Pos.mul x' y') | BinNums.Zneg y' => BinNums.Zneg (BinPos.Pos.mul x' y') end | BinNums.Zneg x' => match y with | BinNums.Z0 => BinNums.Z0 | BinNums.Zpos y' => BinNums.Zneg (BinPos.Pos.mul x' y') | BinNums.Zneg y' => BinNums.Zpos (BinPos.Pos.mul x' y') end end : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.mul (_ _)%Z_scope
simulation_eeq : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (R S : relation2 X Y), eeq R S -> simulation TX TY R -> simulation TX TY S
simulation_t_eeq : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (R S : relation2 X Y), eeq R S -> simulation_t TX TY R -> simulation_t TX TY S
ssrbool.onPhantom : forall (P : ?T -> Prop) (x : ?T), ssreflect.phantom Prop (P x) where ?T : [A : Type X : Type Y : Type Z : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y TZ : reduction_t A Z R : relation2 X Y S : relation2 Y Z |- Type]
tau_weak : forall (A X : Type) (Red : reduction_t A X) (y : X) (l : Lbl A) (x z : X), Red (T A) x y -> Weak Red l y z -> Weak Red l x z
weak_tau : forall (A X : Type) (Red : reduction_t A X) (y : X) (l : Lbl A) (x z : X), Red l x y -> Weak Red (T A) y z -> Weak Red l x z
taus_weak : forall (A X : Type) (Red : reduction_t A X) (y : X) (l : Lbl A) (x z : X), Weak Red (T A) x y -> Weak Red l y z -> Weak Red l x z
weak_taus : forall (A X : Type) (Red : reduction_t A X) (y : X) (l : Lbl A) (x z : X), Weak Red l x y -> Weak Red (T A) y z -> Weak Red l x z
star_trans : forall (X : Type) (R : relation X) (x y z : X), star R x y -> star R y z -> star R x z
diagram_incl : forall (X X' Y Y' : Type) (RX : relation2 X X') (R R' : relation2 X Y) (RY : relation2 Y Y') (S S' : relation2 X' Y'), diagram RX R RY S -> (forall (x : X) (y : Y), R' x y -> R x y) -> (forall (x : X') (y : Y'), S x y -> S' x y) -> diagram RX R' RY S'
S_star : forall (X : Type) (R : relation X) (y x z : X), R x y -> star R y z -> star R x z
star_S : forall (X : Type) (R : relation X) (x y z : X), star R x y -> R y z -> star R x z
wmon_a : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), wmonotonic TX TY F -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, simulation_t TX TY R -> simulation_t TX TY S -> evolve_a TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S)
mon_a : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), monotonic TX TY F -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S)
mon_t : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), monotonic TX TY F -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (F R) (F S)
union2_evolve : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (l : Lbl A) (R R' S : relation2 X Y), evolve_1 TX TY l R S -> evolve_1 TX TY l R' S -> evolve_1 TX TY l (union2 R R') S
incl_evolve : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (l : Lbl A) (R R' S : relation2 X Y), incl R R' -> evolve_1 TX TY l R' S -> evolve_1 TX TY l R S
union2_evolve_left : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (l : Lbl A) (R S S' : relation2 X Y), evolve_1 TX TY l R S -> evolve_1 TX TY l R (union2 S S')
mkmon : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), increasing F -> (forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (F R) (F S)) -> (forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S)) -> monotonic TX TY F
star1 : forall (X : Type) (R : relation X) (x y : X), R x y -> star R x y
ctrl_a : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (B : relation X), controlled TX TY B -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R (comp (star B) R) -> simulation_t TX TY S -> evolve_a TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (comp (star B) R) (comp (star B) S)
evolve_incl : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (l : Lbl A) (S R S' : relation2 X Y), incl S S' -> evolve_1 TX TY l R S -> evolve_1 TX TY l R S'
plus_star : forall (X : Type) (R : relation X) (x y : X), plus R x y -> star R x y
mkwmon : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y), increasing F -> (forall R : relation2 X Y, simulation_t TX TY R -> simulation_t TX TY (F R)) -> (forall R S : relation2 X Y, simulation_t TX TY R -> simulation_t TX TY S -> evolve_a TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S)) -> wmonotonic TX TY F
S_plus : forall (X : Type) (R : relation X) (y x z : X), R x y -> star R y z -> plus R x z
plus_S : forall (X : Type) (R : relation X) (y x z : X), star R x y -> R y z -> plus R x z
union2_evolve_right : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (l : Lbl A) (R S S' : relation2 X Y), evolve_1 TX TY l R S' -> evolve_1 TX TY l R (union2 S S')
star_plus_plus : forall (X : Type) (R : relation X) (y x z : X), star R x y -> plus R y z -> plus R x z
plus_star_plus : forall (X : Type) (R : relation X) (y x z : X), plus R x y -> star R y z -> plus R x z
red_weak : forall (A X : Type) (Red : reduction_t A X) (l : Lbl A) (x y : X), Red l x y -> Weak Red l x y
star_sind : forall (X : Type) (R : relation X) (P : X -> X -> SProp), (forall x : X, P x x) -> (forall y x z : X, R x y -> star R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x x0 : X, star R x x0 -> P x x0
star_ind : forall (X : Type) (R : relation X) (P : X -> X -> Prop), (forall x : X, P x x) -> (forall y x z : X, R x y -> star R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x x0 : X, star R x x0 -> P x x0
Record monotonic (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y) : Prop := mkmon { mon_m : increasing F; mon_t : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (F R) (F S); mon_a : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) } Arguments monotonic [X Y]%type_scope Arguments mkmon [X Y]%type_scope [TX TY F] _ (_ _)%function_scope
mkctrl : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (B : relation X), (forall R : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R (comp (star B) R) -> simulation_t TX TY (comp (star B) R)) -> (forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R (comp (star B) R) -> simulation_t TX TY S -> evolve_a TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (comp (star B) R) (comp (star B) S)) -> controlled TX TY B
Record wmonotonic (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (F : function X Y) : Prop := mkwmon { wmon_m : increasing F; wmon_t : forall R : relation2 X Y, simulation_t TX TY R -> simulation_t TX TY (F R); wmon_a : forall R S : relation2 X Y, simulation_t TX TY R -> simulation_t TX TY S -> evolve_a TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) } Arguments wmonotonic [X Y]%type_scope Arguments mkwmon [X Y]%type_scope [TX TY F] _ (_ _)%function_scope
union_evolve : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (l : Lbl A) (I : Type) (R : I -> relation2 X Y) (S : relation2 X Y), (forall i : I, evolve_1 TX TY l (R i) S) -> evolve_1 TX TY l (union R) S
weak_refl : forall (A X : Type) (Red : reduction_t A X) (x : X), Weak Red (T A) x x
